attributes.action: Overhaul our old age government structures of the past to a new, open community
attributes.additional_details:
Our current government systems and structures are based on procedures, practises, cult like ceremonies and principles that have existed since government itself was created. It doesn't work. It is a system that sustains the system itself. 
Think about it. Hundreds of years in the same cycle with the poorer still getting poorer, the rich getting richer, surveillance becoming more ingrained.
We need an institution collaborating the best minds the country has, a 100% open, unbiased, non profit way
attributes.background:
We need a government that consists of 1000 of the best scholars in their fields. Not people 'sworn in' from social groups and elitist clubs.
We need a school of the countries best economists, geologists, doctors, physicians, environmentalists, resource experts, philosophers, psychologists and so on

rejection.details: If you could start a new petition with a clearer request for action, we could look at this again.
